attributes.action: Allow the use of mobile phone blockers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Mobile phones have become one of the largest causes of noise pollution in the country. As such they should be able to be blocked in public places such as restaurants theatres cinemas and public transport. As long as notices are clearly provided to tell people that such blocking equipment is in use.
The range of such blocking equipment could be set to the limit of the premises in which it is in use
